citation.abstract: Lower extremity overuse injuries are associated with gluteus medius (GMed) weakness. Understanding the activation of muscles about the hip during strengthening exercises is important for rehabilitation.
citation.title: Hip Muscle Activity During 3 Side-Lying Hip-Strengthening Exercises in Distance Runners
